body_html:
I have solved this problem.
Actually, you restore your model like this:

sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
saver = tf.train.import_meta_graph("./tmp/model.ckpt.meta")
save_path = saver.restore(sess, "./tmp/model.ckpt")

Don't place your global_variables_initializer after your restoration, because all the variables will be re-initialized again, therefore it will retrain the model freshly. @xisnu

body:
I have solved this problem.
Actually, you restore your model like this:

sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
saver = tf.train.import_meta_graph("./tmp/model.ckpt.meta")
save_path = saver.restore(sess, "./tmp/model.ckpt")

Don't place your global_variables_initializer after your restoration, because all the variables will be re-initialized again, therefore it will retrain the model freshly. @xisnu
